titleStmt.title: The pernicious consequences of the new heresie of the Jesuites against the King and the state by an advocate of Parliament.
Pernicieuses conséquences de la nouvelle hérésie des Jesuites contre le roy et contre l'estat. English
titleStmt.author: Nicole, Pierre, 1625-1695.
Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.
Arnauld, Antoine, 1612-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Flesher, for Richard Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Translated by John Evelyn from Nicole's Les pernicieuses conséquences de la nouvelle hérésie des Jesuites, 1664.
Sometimes wrongly ascribed to Antoine Arnauld.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
